ul.li: When wielding a melee weapon you're proficient with, gain +1 to attack rolls and deal 1 extra damage die on a critical hit.
The critical range with the weapon is made one larger, (20 becomes 19-20, 19-20 becomes 18-20)

sheet.description: When wielding a melee weapon you're proficient with, gain +1 to attack rolls and deal 1 extra damage die on a critical hit. The critical range with the weapon is made one larger, (20 becomes 19-20, 19-20 becomes 18-20)

ul.li: When making an attack with a melee weapon you're proficient with you can choose to impose a penalty up to -5 on the attack roll. If the attack hits add the double the penalty to the damage roll (-1 to hit gives +2 damage)
If you score a critical hit with a weapon you're proficient with you can take a bonus action to attack the same target again provided you don't have a shield or weapon in your off hand.
